title: Jetting & Conductor Operations - AI Probing Questions

questions.question: Shallow hazard survey shows possible gas at 200m - what's your diverter response plan?
questions.expectedResponse: Clear diverter procedures and crew roles

questions.question: If you encounter unexpected hard formation, what's the maximum WOB before you risk conductor damage?
The programme shows 6 hours jetting time - is this consistent with offset well experience?
What are your setting depth criteria? What if you reach target depth but resistance is insufficient?
questions.expectedResponse: Criteria for acceptable vs insufficient set

questions.question: Conductor cement returns to mudline - what's your response if you lose returns during cement?
questions.expectedResponse: Lost returns procedure during conductor cement

questions.question: Has the diverter system been function tested within the last 14 days?
Your jet bit is 36" but I see a 30" bit on the BHA drawing - which is correct?
Pump rate for jetting is 1200 gpm - what's your maximum pump capacity and is there redundancy?
If shallow water flow is encountered, what's your shut-in procedure before BOP is installed?
The offset well had 15Â° deviation at conductor shoe - what's your plan if you see similar deviation?
